about_the_game:
Set in a futuristic world where androids, known as Valkyries, run rampant and pillage & destroy anything to sustain themselves. The state of the world is in chaos due to it, and all resistance thus far has had little effect to quell the ongoing threat. What’s worse, lesser robots and androids have turned against their owners to join with the Valkyries’ tyranny.

FIGHT OFF THE VALKYRIES!


You were created to deal with this threat. You have been equipped with the greatest technology that humanity has to offer, giving you powers that rival even the strongest of Valkyries.

It matters not how long it takes, so long as you remain active.
It matters not if you are killed, for you can be rebuilt limitlessly.
All that matters is for you to Exceed and Destroy all that threatens Humanity.

CYBERPUNK 2D PLATFORMER


Immerse yourself in the neon soaked cities of New Haven. Progress along the districts as you hunt for Seraphim, the Valkyrie Godmother. Who knows, there might be something new lurking around every corner of the city!

COUNTLESS COMBINATIONS


Equip your android with various items and modifiers. Unhappy with a melee sequence? Then change it up at one of the many upgrade terminals sprawled throughout the city! Enhance yourself with every run and experience each round in an entirely new manner with new weapons, upgrades and skills!

Set in a futuristic world where androids, known as Valkyries, run rampant and pillage & destroy anything to sustain themselves. The state of the world is in chaos due to it, and all resistance thus far has had little effect to quell the ongoing threat. You were created to deal with this threat. You have been equipped with the greatest technology that humanity has to offer, giving you powers that rival even the strongest of Valkyries.

name: EXCEED GEAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD FX-4300 or Intel i3-4130 or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GT430
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (AMD Ryzen 3 1300x or Intel i7-930 or newer)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD / NVIDIA dedicated graphics card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and Shader Model 5.1 support (AMD R9 285 and NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer)

short_description: A 2D rogue-lite anime action game, focused on combos and freedom of expression. Build synergistic combos through mind-blowing modifiers and combat upgrades each run. Fight through hordes of Valkyries and become the savior of the E.X.C.E.E.D program!
